snippet: Some features are still to be added as the government tries to improve the website used to help people select health plans through the Affordable Care Act.
abstract: Cost and benefits of 2016 health plans under Affordable Care Act are unveiled on HealthCare.gov, but features allowing search for plans covering specific doctors or medications are not yet viewable; purchasing of plans begins November 1.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Some features are still to be added as the government tries to improve the website used to help people select health plans through the Affordable Care Act.

headline.print_headline: Federal Officials to Unveil Retooled HealthCare.gov
headline.main: Health Law’s Revamped Site, HealthCare.gov, to Debut on Sunday
